text.div:
MERS (Tests for MERS_CoV Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    74472-2 Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) N3 gene RNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    74473-0 Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) N2 gene RNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    74474-8 Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) upE gene RNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    86578-2 Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) RNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    86579-0 Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) RNA [Presence] in Urine by NAA with probe detection
    88196-1 Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) RNA [Presence] in Stool by NAA with probe detection
    88197-9 Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) RNA [Presence] in Nasopharynx by NAA with probe detection
    88198-7 Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) RNA [Presence] in Cornea or Conjunctiva by NAA with probe detection
    88199-5 Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) RNA [Presence] in Aspirate by NAA with probe detection
    88889-1 Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) RNA [Presence] in Nasopharynx by NAA with non-probe detection
    91807-8 Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) RNA [Presence] in Upper respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
    91830-0 Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) RNA [Presence] in Lower respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
    92967-9 Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) RNA [Presence] in Lower respiratory specimen by NAA with non-probe detection
